mapper.select: select stock_name,stock_code,industry,total_assets from stock where stock_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by total_assets desc
select stock_name,stock_code,industry,total_assets from stock where industry=#{industry} order by total_assets desc limit 3
select distinct t1.stock_name,t1.stock_code from stock t1 left join org_net_fit t2 on t1.stock_code=t2.stock_code where t2.stock_code is null
